title: Don't Let Your War Blind You To The Real Threat
body:
http://gph.is/29FMQWj?noredirect
     Two weeks ago Lol Ergo Urgot declared his intention [to wage war on all of Memes & Games](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/JN6ZGpmu-listen-you-meming-cretins#), to attack your way of life.  He said he would bring an army.

     Recently we've seen the return of various memers such as Kitty Darkstar and RaptorKarr.  You may think that this is a coincidence but I assure you it is not.  Why would Lol Ergo Urgot go through the effort of training posters from the Miscellaneous boards to lead his armies, when he could use seasoned veterans.  He even brazenly declares he has the capabilities to hypnotize.   You were wondering where these memers disappeared to?  Well I posit that they were abducted and brainwashed by Lol Ergo Urgot to be used as tools to wage war on memes and games.  Kitty was gone for much longer as he had to perfect his techniques but now he can do it quickly.

When raptor was asked if they were back:

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0bKNn1Bz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-27T23:19:26.635+0000)
>
> Well not entirely

Clearly an attempt to fight against the brainwashing and warn us

     The boards have been made unstable by the recent wars (shipping or otherwise) and now they are ripe for takeover.  Other posters have displayed rebbelious intent towards LF and MM, two lords of the boards, in innocuous threads as seen here:
****
> [{quoted}](name=Fritterz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EGjt7agy,comment-id=0030000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-08T16:53:07.501+0000)
>
> The same thing we do every tomoro Blazoir, try to take over Memes and Games.

and then

> [{quoted}](name=Blazoir,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EGjt7agy,comment-id=00300000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-08T16:54:39.956+0000)
>
> Got it. Our mission: Beat Laughing Fish and Malicious Metal with our super fun and easy riddle!
> right?

This war initiated by the self declared queen Airman Compsci has distracted everyone from a real danger.  Don't be like {{champion:22}}  and {{champion:113}} and get blindsided by {{champion:127}} Btw if this warning falls on deaf ears and the apocalypse comes I'm hiding with the Brackern.  If you declare allegiance with the Brackern (no need to revoke any other allegiances) you can come too.

https://boosteria.org/wp-content/uploads/skarner-play-styles-set-ups.jpg?noredirect

replies.body:
Excuse me, I'll just be hiding with Skarner and his kin.
They could use some company.

If you'll excuse me I'm just gonna go to Grimrail Depot...

Apparently they've got some technical difficulties with a new train they're working on...

K just call me when the war is over bye!

https://media4.giphy.com/media/Wjtqf63eB4AWQ/200.gif
**GET OUT OF THAT FALLOUT SHELTER, THE WAR IS OVER**

there are wars and riots going on around the world

yet you choose to devote your time to worrying about a forum war...

This is an example of the [Fallacy of Relative Privation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_fallacies#Red_herring_fallacies) and is quite frankly a bit irritating.  I mean the fact that you decided to come onto a games forums and tell this to me also makes it a tad hypocritical.

That being said, I appreciate your concern for global events and the less privileged.  It shows good global citizenship.  It simply is not really relevant in this setting.

Also, I haven't really devoted much time to this war, if anything in my post I make say I'm going to hide and wait it out.  And yeah, these Meme Wars have gotten out of hand which is why the majority of its participants have decided to end it.

But thank you for contributing your opinion. ^_^
Airman has an army already. We are strongest together. UNITE UNDER AIRMAN!
That urgot should beware, This crab will never fail the M&G Boards

Whenever I see something crab related I think of these one minute guides:
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSjf1_zRUr0](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSjf1_zRUr0)
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3fujZ7uy6JU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3fujZ7uy6JU)
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a-y0Gp9gqSY](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a-y0Gp9gqSY)
And I really have to concentrate to not burst out in laughter

I wouldn't let myself be brainwashed by some....

Who?

Anyways, I've been planning on staying out of all wars and just siding with whoever emerges as the victor.
Assuming you aren't brainwashed, you can come hide with the Brackern in the meantime
That's Skarner's race, right?
Yep!  I would post a picture, but Skarner art is basically non-existent ;(
Okay... You are right... He's trying to take control of our board now that Fishes has taken a break
What!  ... This is not good.  SPREAD THE WORD.   Before it's to late.
WAIT, WE CAN'T SPAM THIS, THIS IS WHAT CAUSED SO MUCH ANGER AND ANNOYANCE DURING THE CRISIS
True, we'll just have to remain vigilant

We contain him, then we slay him

Come on Our Spiney Poro

*jumps on back*

WE RIDE TO VICTORY

What's this guy's problem
*help me*

Such a silly conspiracy theory
*can't fight back*

And that Poro isn't even cute
*it is, I swear*

**PULLS KNIFE**
*can't control it*

Just die
*sorry*

**BACKSTABS 80 times**

Think about it for a second.  Where is a scorpion's back?  And what will be above you while you futilely try to stab through my crystalline exoskeleton?  A stinger.  I"ll forgive you for this transgression.

**Clone explodes upon Impale, knives blow up into the Poro's face**

Now, that wasn't hard
*fuck me*
What kind of cookies are they?
Whatever ones MM and Airman are offering.
